                              <div class="line">For shape, for bearing, argument and valour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Goes foremost in report through Italy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, he hath an excellent good name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">URSULA</div>
                              <div class="line">His excellence did earn it, ere he had it.</div>
                              <div class="line">When are you married, madam?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, every day, to-morrow. Come, go in:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll show thee some attires, and have thy counsel</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is the best to furnish me to-morrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">URSULA</div>
                              <div class="line">She's limed, I warrant you: we have caught her, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">If it proves so, then loving goes by haps:</div>
                              <div class="line">Some Cupid kills with arrows, some with traps.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt HERO and URSULA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Coming forward</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">What fire is in mine ears? Can this be true?</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand I condemn'd for pride and scorn so much?</div>
                              <div class="line">Contempt, farewell! and maiden pride, adieu!</div>
                              <div class="line">No glory lives behind the back of such.</div>
                              <div class="line">And, Benedick, love on; I will requite thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Taming my wild heart to thy loving hand:</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou dost love, my kindness shall incite thee</div>
                              <div class="line">To bind our loves up in a holy band;</div>
                              <div class="line">For others say thou dost deserve, and I</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe it better than reportingly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in LEONATO'S house</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DON PEDRO, CLAUDIO, BENEDICK, and LEONATO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do but stay till your marriage be consummate, and</div>
                              <div class="line">then go I toward Arragon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring you thither, my lord, if you'll</div>
                              <div class="line">vouchsafe me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that would be as great a soil in the new gloss</div>
                              <div class="line">of your marriage as to show a child his new coat</div>
                              <div class="line">and forbid him to wear it. I will only be bold</div>
                              <div class="line">with Benedick for his company; for, from the crown</div>
                              <div class="line">of his head to the sole of his foot, he is all</div>
                              <div class="line">mirth: he hath twice or thrice cut Cupid's</div>
                              <div class="line">bow-string and the little hangman dare not shoot at</div>
                              <div class="line">him; he hath a heart as sound as a bell and his</div>
                              <div class="line">tongue is the clapper, for what his heart thinks his</div>
                              <div class="line">tongue speaks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Gallants, I am not as I have been.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">So say I methinks you are sadder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope he be in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him, truant! there's no true drop of blood in</div>
                              <div class="line">him, to be truly touched with love: if he be sad,</div>
                              <div class="line">he wants money.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">I have the toothache.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Draw it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang it!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You must hang it first, and draw it afterwards.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">What! sigh for the toothache?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is but a humour or a worm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, every one can master a grief but he that has</div>
                              <div class="line">it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet say I, he is in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no appearance of fancy in him, unless it be</div>
                              <div class="line">a fancy that he hath to strange disguises; as, to be</div>
                              <div class="line">a Dutchman today, a Frenchman to-morrow, or in the</div>
                              <div class="line">shape of two countries at once, as, a German from</div>
                              <div class="line">the waist downward, all slops, and a Spaniard from</div>
                              <div class="line">the hip upward, no doublet. Unless he have a fancy</div>
                              <div class="line">to this foolery, as it appears he hath, he is no</div>
                              <div class="line">fool for fancy, as you would have it appear he is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be not in love with some woman, there is no</div>
                              <div class="line">believing old signs: a' brushes his hat o'</div>
                              <div class="line">mornings; what should that bode?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath any man seen him at the barber's?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, but the barber's man hath been seen with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">and the old ornament of his cheek hath already</div>
                              <div class="line">stuffed tennis-balls.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, he looks younger than he did, by the loss of a beard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, a' rubs himself with civet: can you smell him</div>
                              <div class="line">out by that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's as much as to say, the sweet youth's in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">The greatest note of it is his melancholy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And when was he wont to wash his face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, or to paint himself? for the which, I hear</div>
                              <div class="line">what they say of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but his jesting spirit; which is now crept into</div>
                              <div class="line">a lute-string and now governed by stops.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, that tells a heavy tale for him: conclude,</div>
                              <div class="line">conclude he is in love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but I know who loves him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">That would I know too: I warrant, one that knows him not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, and his ill conditions; and, in despite of</div>
                              <div class="line">all, dies for him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">She shall be buried with her face upwards.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet is this no charm for the toothache. Old</div>
                              <div class="line">signior, walk aside with me: I have studied eight</div>
                              <div class="line">or nine wise words to speak to you, which these</div>
                              <div class="line">hobby-horses must not hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt BENEDICK and LEONATO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">For my life, to break with him about Beatrice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis even so. Hero and Margaret have by this</div>
                              <div class="line">played their parts with Beatrice; and then the two</div>
                              <div class="line">bears will not bite one another when they meet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DON JOHN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord and brother, God save you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good den, brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">If your leisure served, I would speak with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">In private?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">If it please you: yet Count Claudio may hear; for</div>
                              <div class="line">what I would speak of concerns him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To CLAUDIO</span>  Means your lordship to be married</div>
                              <div class="line">to-morrow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">You know he does.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not that, when he knows what I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If there be any impediment, I pray you discover it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">You may think I love you not: let that appear</div>
                              <div class="line">hereafter, and aim better at me by that I now will</div>
                              <div class="line">manifest. For my brother, I think he holds you</div>
                              <div class="line">well, and in dearness of heart hath holp to effect</div>
                              <div class="line">your ensuing marriage;--surely suit ill spent and</div>
                              <div class="line">labour ill bestowed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">I came hither to tell you; and, circumstances</div>
                              <div class="line">shortened, for she has been too long a talking of,</div>
                              <div class="line">the lady is disloyal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, Hero?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Even she; Leonato's Hero, your Hero, every man's Hero:</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Disloyal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">The word is too good to paint out her wickedness; I</div>
                              <div class="line">could say she were worse: think you of a worse</div>
                              <div class="line">title, and I will fit her to it. Wonder not till</div>
                              <div class="line">further warrant: go but with me to-night, you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">see her chamber-window entered, even the night</div>
                              <div class="line">before her wedding-day: if you love her then,</div>
                              <div class="line">to-morrow wed her; but it would better fit your honour</div>
                              <div class="line">to change your mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">May this be so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not think it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">If you dare not trust that you see, confess not</div>
                              <div class="line">that you know: if you will follow me, I will show</div>
                              <div class="line">you enough; and when you have seen more and heard</div>
                              <div class="line">more, proceed accordingly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If I see any thing to-night why I should not marry</div>
                              <div class="line">her to-morrow in the congregation, where I should</div>
                              <div class="line">wed, there will I shame her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">And, as I wooed for thee to obtain her, I will join</div>
                              <div class="line">with thee to disgrace her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">I will disparage her no farther till you are my</div>
                              <div class="line">witnesses: bear it coldly but till midnight, and</div>
                              <div class="line">let the issue show itself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">O day untowardly turned!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O mischief strangely thwarting!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">O plague right well prevented! so will you say when</div>
                              <div class="line">you have seen the sequel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DOGBERRY and VERGES with the Watch</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you good men and true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, or else it were pity but they should suffer</div>
                              <div class="line">salvation, body and soul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that were a punishment too good for them, if</div>
                              <div class="line">they should have any allegiance in them, being</div>
                              <div class="line">chosen for the prince's watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, give them their charge, neighbour Dogberry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">First, who think you the most desertless man to be</div>
                              <div class="line">constable?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">Hugh Otecake, sir, or George Seacole; for they can</div>
                              <div class="line">write and read.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, neighbour Seacole. God hath blessed</div>
                              <div class="line">you with a good name: to be a well-favoured man is</div>
                              <div class="line">the gift of fortune; but to write and read comes by nature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">Both which, master constable,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">You have: I knew it would be your answer. Well,</div>
                              <div class="line">for your favour, sir, why, give God thanks, and make</div>
                              <div class="line">no boast of it; and for your writing and reading,</div>
                              <div class="line">let that appear when there is no need of such</div>
                              <div class="line">vanity. You are thought here to be the most</div>
                              <div class="line">senseless and fit man for the constable of the</div>
                              <div class="line">watch; therefore bear you the lantern. This is your</div>
                              <div class="line">charge: you shall comprehend all vagrom men; you are</div>
                              <div class="line">to bid any man stand, in the prince's name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">How if a' will not stand?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, take no note of him, but let him go; and</div>
                              <div class="line">presently call the rest of the watch together and</div>
                              <div class="line">thank God you are rid of a knave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">If he will not stand when he is bidden, he is none</div>
                              <div class="line">of the prince's subjects.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">True, and they are to meddle with none but the</div>
                              <div class="line">prince's subjects. You shall also make no noise in</div>
                              <div class="line">the streets; for, for the watch to babble and to</div>
                              <div class="line">talk is most tolerable and not to be endured.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">We will rather sleep than talk: we know what</div>
                              <div class="line">belongs to a watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, you speak like an ancient and most quiet</div>
                              <div class="line">watchman; for I cannot see how sleeping should</div>
                              <div class="line">offend: only, have a care that your bills be not</div>
                              <div class="line">stolen. Well, you are to call at all the</div>
                              <div class="line">ale-houses, and bid those that are drunk get them to bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">How if they will not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, let them alone till they are sober: if</div>
                              <div class="line">they make you not then the better answer, you may</div>
                              <div class="line">say they are not the men you took them for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">If you meet a thief, you may suspect him, by virtue</div>
                              <div class="line">of your office, to be no true man; and, for such</div>
                              <div class="line">kind of men, the less you meddle or make with them,</div>
                              <div class="line">why the more is for your honesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">If we know him to be a thief, shall we not lay</div>
                              <div class="line">hands on him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, by your office, you may; but I think they</div>
                              <div class="line">that touch pitch will be defiled: the most peaceable</div>
                              <div class="line">way for you, if you do take a thief, is to let him</div>
                              <div class="line">show himself what he is and steal out of your company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">You have been always called a merciful man, partner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, I would not hang a dog by my will, much more</div>
                              <div class="line">a man who hath any honesty in him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">If you hear a child cry in the night, you must call</div>
                              <div class="line">to the nurse and bid her still it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">How if the nurse be asleep and will not hear us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, depart in peace, and let the child wake</div>
                              <div class="line">her with crying; for the ewe that will not hear her</div>
                              <div class="line">lamb when it baes will never answer a calf when he bleats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis very true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the end of the charge:--you, constable, are</div>
                              <div class="line">to present the prince's own person: if you meet the</div>
                              <div class="line">prince in the night, you may stay him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, by'r our lady, that I think a' cannot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Five shillings to one on't, with any man that knows</div>
                              <div class="line">the statutes, he may stay him: marry, not without</div>
                              <div class="line">the prince be willing; for, indeed, the watch ought</div>
                              <div class="line">to offend no man; and it is an offence to stay a</div>
                              <div class="line">man against his will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">By'r lady, I think it be so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha! Well, masters, good night: an there be</div>
                              <div class="line">any matter of weight chances, call up me: keep your</div>
                              <div class="line">fellows' counsels and your own; and good night.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, neighbour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, masters, we hear our charge: let us go sit here</div>
                              <div class="line">upon the church-bench till two, and then all to bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">One word more, honest neighbours. I pray you watch</div>
                              <div class="line">about Signior Leonato's door; for the wedding being</div>
                              <div class="line">there to-morrow, there is a great coil to-night.</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu: be vigitant, I beseech you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DOGBERRY and VERGES</p>
                        <p>Enter BORACHIO and CONRADE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What Conrade!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Peace! stir not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Conrade, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, man; I am at thy elbow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mass, and my elbow itched; I thought there would a</div>
                              <div class="line">scab follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will owe thee an answer for that: and now forward</div>
                              <div class="line">with thy tale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand thee close, then, under this pent-house, for</div>
                              <div class="line">it drizzles rain; and I will, like a true drunkard,</div>
                              <div class="line">utter all to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Some treason, masters: yet stand close.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore know I have earned of Don John a thousand ducats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it possible that any villany should be so dear?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shouldst rather ask if it were possible any</div>
                              <div class="line">villany should be so rich; for when rich villains</div>
                              <div class="line">have need of poor ones, poor ones may make what</div>
                              <div class="line">price they will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">I wonder at it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That shows thou art unconfirmed. Thou knowest that</div>
                              <div class="line">the fashion of a doublet, or a hat, or a cloak, is</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing to a man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, it is apparel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, the fashion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, the fashion is the fashion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tush! I may as well say the fool's the fool. But</div>
                              <div class="line">seest thou not what a deformed thief this fashion</div>
                              <div class="line">is?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I know that Deformed; a' has been a vile</div>
                              <div class="line">thief this seven year; a' goes up and down like a</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman: I remember his name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst thou not hear somebody?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">No; 'twas the vane on the house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Seest thou not, I say, what a deformed thief this</div>
                              <div class="line">fashion is? how giddily a' turns about all the hot</div>
                              <div class="line">bloods between fourteen and five-and-thirty?</div>
                              <div class="line">sometimes fashioning them like Pharaoh's soldiers</div>
                              <div class="line">in the reeky painting, sometime like god Bel's</div>
                              <div class="line">priests in the old church-window, sometime like the</div>
                              <div class="line">shaven Hercules in the smirched worm-eaten tapestry,</div>
                              <div class="line">where his codpiece seems as massy as his club?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">All this I see; and I see that the fashion wears</div>
                              <div class="line">out more apparel than the man. But art not thou</div>
                              <div class="line">thyself giddy with the fashion too, that thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">shifted out of thy tale into telling me of the fashion?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so, neither: but know that I have to-night</div>
                              <div class="line">wooed Margaret, the Lady Hero's gentlewoman, by the</div>
                              <div class="line">name of Hero: she leans me out at her mistress'</div>
                              <div class="line">chamber-window, bids me a thousand times good</div>
                              <div class="line">night,--I tell this tale vilely:--I should first</div>
                              <div class="line">tell thee how the prince, Claudio and my master,</div>
                              <div class="line">planted and placed and possessed by my master Don</div>
                              <div class="line">John, saw afar off in the orchard this amiable encounter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">And thought they Margaret was Hero?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Two of them did, the prince and Claudio; but the</div>
                              <div class="line">devil my master knew she was Margaret; and partly</div>
                              <div class="line">by his oaths, which first possessed them, partly by</div>
                              <div class="line">the dark night, which did deceive them, but chiefly</div>
                              <div class="line">by my villany, which did confirm any slander that</div>
                              <div class="line">Don John had made, away went Claudio enraged; swore</div>
                              <div class="line">he would meet her, as he was appointed, next morning</div>
                              <div class="line">at the temple, and there, before the whole</div>
                              <div class="line">congregation, shame her with what he saw o'er night</div>
                              <div class="line">and send her home again without a husband.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">We charge you, in the prince's name, stand!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">Call up the right master constable. We have here</div>
                              <div class="line">recovered the most dangerous piece of lechery that</div>
                              <div class="line">ever was known in the commonwealth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">And one Deformed is one of them: I know him; a'</div>
                              <div class="line">wears a lock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Masters, masters,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll be made bring Deformed forth, I warrant you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Masters,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Watchman</div>
                              <div class="line">Never speak: we charge you let us obey you to go with us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">We are like to prove a goodly commodity, being taken</div>
                              <div class="line">up of these men's bills.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">A commodity in question, I warrant you. Come, we'll obey you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  HERO's apartment.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HERO, MARGARET, and URSULA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Ursula, wake my cousin Beatrice, and desire</div>
                              <div class="line">her to rise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">URSULA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid her come hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">URSULA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Troth, I think your other rabato were better.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, pray thee, good Meg, I'll wear this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, 's not so good; and I warrant your</div>
                              <div class="line">cousin will say so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">My cousin's a fool, and thou art another: I'll wear</div>
                              <div class="line">none but this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">I like the new tire within excellently, if the hair</div>
                              <div class="line">were a thought browner; and your gown's a most rare</div>
                              <div class="line">fashion, i' faith. I saw the Duchess of Milan's</div>
                              <div class="line">gown that they praise so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that exceeds, they say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, 's but a night-gown in respect of</div>
                              <div class="line">yours: cloth o' gold, and cuts, and laced with</div>
                              <div class="line">silver, set with pearls, down sleeves, side sleeves,</div>
                              <div class="line">and skirts, round underborne with a bluish tinsel:</div>
                              <div class="line">but for a fine, quaint, graceful and excellent</div>
                              <div class="line">fashion, yours is worth ten on 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">God give me joy to wear it! for my heart is</div>
                              <div class="line">exceeding heavy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twill be heavier soon by the weight of a man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie upon thee! art not ashamed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what, lady? of speaking honourably? Is not</div>
                              <div class="line">marriage honourable in a beggar? Is not your lord</div>
                              <div class="line">honourable without marriage? I think you would have</div>
                              <div class="line">me say, 'saving your reverence, a husband:' and bad</div>
                              <div class="line">thinking do not wrest true speaking, I'll offend</div>
                              <div class="line">nobody: is there any harm in 'the heavier for a</div>
                              <div class="line">husband'? None, I think, and it be the right husband</div>
                              <div class="line">and the right wife; otherwise 'tis light, and not</div>
                              <div class="line">heavy: ask my Lady Beatrice else; here she comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BEATRICE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, coz.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, sweet Hero.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why how now? do you speak in the sick tune?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am out of all other tune, methinks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Clap's into 'Light o' love;' that goes without a</div>
                              <div class="line">burden: do you sing it, and I'll dance it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye light o' love, with your heels! then, if your</div>
                              <div class="line">husband have stables enough, you'll see he shall</div>
                              <div class="line">lack no barns.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">O illegitimate construction! I scorn that with my heels.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis almost five o'clock, cousin; tis time you were</div>
                              <div class="line">ready. By my troth, I am exceeding ill: heigh-ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">For a hawk, a horse, or a husband?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">For the letter that begins them all, H.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, and you be not turned Turk, there's no more</div>
                              <div class="line">sailing by the star.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">What means the fool, trow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing I; but God send every one their heart's desire!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">These gloves the count sent me; they are an</div>
                              <div class="line">excellent perfume.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am stuffed, cousin; I cannot smell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">A maid, and stuffed! there's goodly catching of cold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, God help me! God help me! how long have you</div>
                              <div class="line">professed apprehension?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Even since you left it. Doth not my wit become me rarely?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not seen enough, you should wear it in your</div>
                              <div class="line">cap. By my troth, I am sick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Get you some of this distilled Carduus Benedictus,</div>
                              <div class="line">and lay it to your heart: it is the only thing for a qualm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">There thou prickest her with a thistle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Benedictus! why Benedictus? you have some moral in</div>
                              <div class="line">this Benedictus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Moral! no, by my troth, I have no moral meaning; I</div>
                              <div class="line">meant, plain holy-thistle. You may think perchance</div>
                              <div class="line">that I think you are in love: nay, by'r lady, I am</div>
                              <div class="line">not such a fool to think what I list, nor I list</div>
                              <div class="line">not to think what I can, nor indeed I cannot think,</div>
                              <div class="line">if I would think my heart out of thinking, that you</div>
                              <div class="line">are in love or that you will be in love or that you</div>
                              <div class="line">can be in love. Yet Benedick was such another, and</div>
                              <div class="line">now is he become a man: he swore he would never</div>
                              <div class="line">marry, and yet now, in despite of his heart, he eats</div>
                              <div class="line">his meat without grudging: and how you may be</div>
                              <div class="line">converted I know not, but methinks you look with</div>
                              <div class="line">your eyes as other women do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">What pace is this that thy tongue keeps?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARGARET</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a false gallop.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter URSULA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">URSULA</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, withdraw: the prince, the count, Signior</div>
                              <div class="line">Benedick, Don John, and all the gallants of the</div>
                              <div class="line">town, are come to fetch you to church.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Help to dress me, good coz, good Meg, good Ursula.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Another room in LEONATO'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LEONATO, with DOGBERRY and VERGES</p>
