                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">What would you with me, honest neighbour?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, I would have some confidence with you</div>
                              <div class="line">that decerns you nearly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Brief, I pray you; for you see it is a busy time with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, this it is, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, in truth it is, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is it, my good friends?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Goodman Verges, sir, speaks a little off the</div>
                              <div class="line">matter: an old man, sir, and his wits are not so</div>
                              <div class="line">blunt as, God help, I would desire they were; but,</div>
                              <div class="line">in faith, honest as the skin between his brows.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, I thank God I am as honest as any man living</div>
                              <div class="line">that is an old man and no honester than I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Comparisons are odorous: palabras, neighbour Verges.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Neighbours, you are tedious.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">It pleases your worship to say so, but we are the</div>
                              <div class="line">poor duke's officers; but truly, for mine own part,</div>
                              <div class="line">if I were as tedious as a king, I could find it in</div>
                              <div class="line">my heart to bestow it all of your worship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">All thy tediousness on me, ah?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, an 'twere a thousand pound more than 'tis; for</div>
                              <div class="line">I hear as good exclamation on your worship as of any</div>
                              <div class="line">man in the city; and though I be but a poor man, I</div>
                              <div class="line">am glad to hear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">And so am I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">I would fain know what you have to say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, our watch to-night, excepting your</div>
                              <div class="line">worship's presence, ha' ta'en a couple of as arrant</div>
                              <div class="line">knaves as any in Messina.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">A good old man, sir; he will be talking: as they</div>
                              <div class="line">say, when the age is in, the wit is out: God help</div>
                              <div class="line">us! it is a world to see. Well said, i' faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">neighbour Verges: well, God's a good man; an two men</div>
                              <div class="line">ride of a horse, one must ride behind. An honest</div>
                              <div class="line">soul, i' faith, sir; by my troth he is, as ever</div>
                              <div class="line">broke bread; but God is to be worshipped; all men</div>
                              <div class="line">are not alike; alas, good neighbour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, neighbour, he comes too short of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Gifts that God gives.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">I must leave you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">One word, sir: our watch, sir, have indeed</div>
                              <div class="line">comprehended two aspicious persons, and we would</div>
                              <div class="line">have them this morning examined before your worship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Take their examination yourself and bring it me: I</div>
                              <div class="line">am now in great haste, as it may appear unto you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be suffigance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Drink some wine ere you go: fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, they stay for you to give your daughter to</div>
                              <div class="line">her husband.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll wait upon them: I am ready.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt LEONATO and Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, good partner, go, get you to Francis Seacole;</div>
                              <div class="line">bid him bring his pen and inkhorn to the gaol: we</div>
                              <div class="line">are now to examination these men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">And we must do it wisely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">We will spare for no wit, I warrant you; here's</div>
                              <div class="line">that shall drive some of them to a non-come: only</div>
                              <div class="line">get the learned writer to set down our</div>
                              <div class="line">excommunication and meet me at the gaol.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  A church.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A prison.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A church.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DON PEDRO, DON JOHN, LEONATO, FRIAR FRANCIS,
CLAUDIO, BENEDICK, HERO, BEATRICE, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Friar Francis, be brief; only to the plain</div>
                              <div class="line">form of marriage, and you shall recount their</div>
                              <div class="line">particular duties afterwards.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">You come hither, my lord, to marry this lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">To be married to her: friar, you come to marry her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, you come hither to be married to this count.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">If either of you know any inward impediment why you</div>
                              <div class="line">should not be conjoined, charge you, on your souls,</div>
                              <div class="line">to utter it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you any, Hero?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">None, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you any, count?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare make his answer, none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, what men dare do! what men may do! what men daily</div>
                              <div class="line">do, not knowing what they do!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! interjections? Why, then, some be of</div>
                              <div class="line">laughing, as, ah, ha, he!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand thee by, friar. Father, by your leave:</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you with free and unconstrained soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me this maid, your daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">As freely, son, as God did give her me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And what have I to give you back, whose worth</div>
                              <div class="line">May counterpoise this rich and precious gift?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing, unless you render her again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet prince, you learn me noble thankfulness.</div>
                              <div class="line">There, Leonato, take her back again:</div>
                              <div class="line">Give not this rotten orange to your friend;</div>
                              <div class="line">She's but the sign and semblance of her honour.</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold how like a maid she blushes here!</div>
                              <div class="line">O, what authority and show of truth</div>
                              <div class="line">Can cunning sin cover itself withal!</div>
                              <div class="line">Comes not that blood as modest evidence</div>
                              <div class="line">To witness simple virtue? Would you not swear,</div>
                              <div class="line">All you that see her, that she were a maid,</div>
                              <div class="line">By these exterior shows? But she is none:</div>
                              <div class="line">She knows the heat of a luxurious bed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Her blush is guiltiness, not modesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you mean, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to be married,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to knit my soul to an approved wanton.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear my lord, if you, in your own proof,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have vanquish'd the resistance of her youth,</div>
                              <div class="line">And made defeat of her virginity,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know what you would say: if I have known her,</div>
                              <div class="line">You will say she did embrace me as a husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so extenuate the 'forehand sin:</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Leonato,</div>
                              <div class="line">I never tempted her with word too large;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, as a brother to his sister, show'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Bashful sincerity and comely love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">And seem'd I ever otherwise to you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Out on thee! Seeming! I will write against it:</div>
                              <div class="line">You seem to me as Dian in her orb,</div>
                              <div class="line">As chaste as is the bud ere it be blown;</div>
                              <div class="line">But you are more intemperate in your blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Than Venus, or those pamper'd animals</div>
                              <div class="line">That rage in savage sensuality.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is my lord well, that he doth speak so wide?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet prince, why speak not you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">What should I speak?</div>
                              <div class="line">I stand dishonour'd, that have gone about</div>
                              <div class="line">To link my dear friend to a common stale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are these things spoken, or do I but dream?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, they are spoken, and these things are true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">This looks not like a nuptial.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">True! O God!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Leonato, stand I here?</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the prince? is this the prince's brother?</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this face Hero's? are our eyes our own?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">All this is so: but what of this, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me but move one question to your daughter;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, by that fatherly and kindly power</div>
                              <div class="line">That you have in her, bid her answer truly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">I charge thee do so, as thou art my child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, God defend me! how am I beset!</div>
                              <div class="line">What kind of catechising call you this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To make you answer truly to your name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it not Hero? Who can blot that name</div>
                              <div class="line">With any just reproach?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, that can Hero;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hero itself can blot out Hero's virtue.</div>
                              <div class="line">What man was he talk'd with you yesternight</div>
                              <div class="line">Out at your window betwixt twelve and one?</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, if you are a maid, answer to this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">I talk'd with no man at that hour, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON PEDRO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then are you no maiden. Leonato,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry you must hear: upon mine honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself, my brother and this grieved count</div>
                              <div class="line">Did see her, hear her, at that hour last night</div>
                              <div class="line">Talk with a ruffian at her chamber-window</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hath indeed, most like a liberal villain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Confess'd the vile encounters they have had</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand times in secret.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie! they are not to be named, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to be spoke of;</div>
                              <div class="line">There is not chastity enough in language</div>
                              <div class="line">Without offence to utter them. Thus, pretty lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry for thy much misgovernment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O Hero, what a Hero hadst thou been,</div>
                              <div class="line">If half thy outward graces had been placed</div>
                              <div class="line">About thy thoughts and counsels of thy heart!</div>
                              <div class="line">But fare thee well, most foul, most fair! farewell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou pure impiety and impious purity!</div>
                              <div class="line">For thee I'll lock up all the gates of love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And on my eyelids shall conjecture hang,</div>
                              <div class="line">To turn all beauty into thoughts of harm,</div>
                              <div class="line">And never shall it more be gracious.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath no man's dagger here a point for me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>HERO swoons</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, cousin! wherefore sink you down?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DON JOHN</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let us go. These things, come thus to light,</div>
                              <div class="line">Smother her spirits up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DON PEDRO, DON JOHN, and CLAUDIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">How doth the lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Dead, I think. Help, uncle!</div>
                              <div class="line">Hero! why, Hero! Uncle! Signior Benedick! Friar!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">O Fate! take not away thy heavy hand.</div>
                              <div class="line">Death is the fairest cover for her shame</div>
                              <div class="line">That may be wish'd for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, cousin Hero!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have comfort, lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou look up?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, wherefore should she not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore! Why, doth not every earthly thing</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry shame upon her? Could she here deny</div>
                              <div class="line">The story that is printed in her blood?</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not live, Hero; do not ope thine eyes:</div>
                              <div class="line">For, did I think thou wouldst not quickly die,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thought I thy spirits were stronger than thy shames,</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself would, on the rearward of reproaches,</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike at thy life. Grieved I, I had but one?</div>
                              <div class="line">Chid I for that at frugal nature's frame?</div>
                              <div class="line">O, one too much by thee! Why had I one?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why ever wast thou lovely in my eyes?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why had I not with charitable hand</div>
                              <div class="line">Took up a beggar's issue at my gates,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who smirch'd thus and mired with infamy,</div>
                              <div class="line">I might have said 'No part of it is mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">This shame derives itself from unknown loins'?</div>
                              <div class="line">But mine and mine I loved and mine I praised</div>
                              <div class="line">And mine that I was proud on, mine so much</div>
                              <div class="line">That I myself was to myself not mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Valuing of her,--why, she, O, she is fallen</div>
                              <div class="line">Into a pit of ink, that the wide sea</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath drops too few to wash her clean again</div>
                              <div class="line">And salt too little which may season give</div>
                              <div class="line">To her foul-tainted flesh!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, sir, be patient.</div>
                              <div class="line">For my part, I am so attired in wonder,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not what to say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, on my soul, my cousin is belied!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, were you her bedfellow last night?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, truly not; although, until last night,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have this twelvemonth been her bedfellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Confirm'd, confirm'd! O, that is stronger made</div>
                              <div class="line">Which was before barr'd up with ribs of iron!</div>
                              <div class="line">Would the two princes lie, and Claudio lie,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who loved her so, that, speaking of her foulness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wash'd it with tears? Hence from her! let her die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me a little; for I have only been</div>
                              <div class="line">Silent so long and given way unto</div>
                              <div class="line">This course of fortune</div>
                              <div class="line">By noting of the lady. I have mark'd</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand blushing apparitions</div>
                              <div class="line">To start into her face, a thousand innocent shames</div>
                              <div class="line">In angel whiteness beat away those blushes;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in her eye there hath appear'd a fire,</div>
                              <div class="line">To burn the errors that these princes hold</div>
                              <div class="line">Against her maiden truth. Call me a fool;</div>
                              <div class="line">Trust not my reading nor my observations,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which with experimental seal doth warrant</div>
                              <div class="line">The tenor of my book; trust not my age,</div>
                              <div class="line">My reverence, calling, nor divinity,</div>
                              <div class="line">If this sweet lady lie not guiltless here</div>
                              <div class="line">Under some biting error.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Friar, it cannot be.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou seest that all the grace that she hath left</div>
                              <div class="line">Is that she will not add to her damnation</div>
                              <div class="line">A sin of perjury; she not denies it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why seek'st thou then to cover with excuse</div>
                              <div class="line">That which appears in proper nakedness?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, what man is he you are accused of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HERO</div>
                              <div class="line">They know that do accuse me; I know none:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I know more of any man alive</div>
                              <div class="line">Than that which maiden modesty doth warrant,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let all my sins lack mercy! O my father,</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove you that any man with me conversed</div>
                              <div class="line">At hours unmeet, or that I yesternight</div>
                              <div class="line">Maintain'd the change of words with any creature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Refuse me, hate me, torture me to death!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">There is some strange misprision in the princes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Two of them have the very bent of honour;</div>
                              <div class="line">And if their wisdoms be misled in this,</div>
                              <div class="line">The practise of it lives in John the bastard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose spirits toil in frame of villanies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not. If they speak but truth of her,</div>
                              <div class="line">These hands shall tear her; if they wrong her honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">The proudest of them shall well hear of it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Time hath not yet so dried this blood of mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor age so eat up my invention,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor fortune made such havoc of my means,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor my bad life reft me so much of friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">But they shall find, awaked in such a kind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both strength of limb and policy of mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ability in means and choice of friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">To quit me of them throughly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pause awhile,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let my counsel sway you in this case.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your daughter here the princes left for dead:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let her awhile be secretly kept in,</div>
                              <div class="line">And publish it that she is dead indeed;</div>
                              <div class="line">Maintain a mourning ostentation</div>
                              <div class="line">And on your family's old monument</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang mournful epitaphs and do all rites</div>
                              <div class="line">That appertain unto a burial.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall become of this? what will this do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, this well carried shall on her behalf</div>
                              <div class="line">Change slander to remorse; that is some good:</div>
                              <div class="line">But not for that dream I on this strange course,</div>
                              <div class="line">But on this travail look for greater birth.</div>
                              <div class="line">She dying, as it must so be maintain'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the instant that she was accused,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be lamented, pitied and excused</div>
                              <div class="line">Of every hearer: for it so falls out</div>
                              <div class="line">That what we have we prize not to the worth</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles we enjoy it, but being lack'd and lost,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then we rack the value, then we find</div>
                              <div class="line">The virtue that possession would not show us</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles it was ours. So will it fare with Claudio:</div>
                              <div class="line">When he shall hear she died upon his words,</div>
                              <div class="line">The idea of her life shall sweetly creep</div>
                              <div class="line">Into his study of imagination,</div>
                              <div class="line">And every lovely organ of her life</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall come apparell'd in more precious habit,</div>
                              <div class="line">More moving-delicate and full of life,</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the eye and prospect of his soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than when she lived indeed; then shall he mourn,</div>
                              <div class="line">If ever love had interest in his liver,</div>
                              <div class="line">And wish he had not so accused her,</div>
                              <div class="line">No, though he thought his accusation true.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let this be so, and doubt not but success</div>
                              <div class="line">Will fashion the event in better shape</div>
                              <div class="line">Than I can lay it down in likelihood.</div>
                              <div class="line">But if all aim but this be levell'd false,</div>
                              <div class="line">The supposition of the lady's death</div>
                              <div class="line">Will quench the wonder of her infamy:</div>
                              <div class="line">And if it sort not well, you may conceal her,</div>
                              <div class="line">As best befits her wounded reputation,</div>
                              <div class="line">In some reclusive and religious life,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of all eyes, tongues, minds and injuries.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Leonato, let the friar advise you:</div>
                              <div class="line">And though you know my inwardness and love</div>
                              <div class="line">Is very much unto the prince and Claudio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, by mine honour, I will deal in this</div>
                              <div class="line">As secretly and justly as your soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Should with your body.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LEONATO</div>
                              <div class="line">Being that I flow in grief,</div>
                              <div class="line">The smallest twine may lead me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR FRANCIS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well consented: presently away;</div>
                              <div class="line">For to strange sores strangely they strain the cure.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, lady, die to live: this wedding-day</div>
                              <div class="line">Perhaps is but prolong'd: have patience and endure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but BENEDICK and BEATRICE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady Beatrice, have you wept all this while?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, and I will weep a while longer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not desire that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">You have no reason; I do it freely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Surely I do believe your fair cousin is wronged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, how much might the man deserve of me that would right her!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there any way to show such friendship?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">A very even way, but no such friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">May a man do it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a man's office, but not yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">I do love nothing in the world so well as you: is</div>
                              <div class="line">not that strange?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">As strange as the thing I know not. It were as</div>
                              <div class="line">possible for me to say I loved nothing so well as</div>
                              <div class="line">you: but believe me not; and yet I lie not; I</div>
                              <div class="line">confess nothing, nor I deny nothing. I am sorry for my cousin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">By my sword, Beatrice, thou lovest me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not swear, and eat it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">I will swear by it that you love me; and I will make</div>
                              <div class="line">him eat it that says I love not you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you not eat your word?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">With no sauce that can be devised to it. I protest</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, God forgive me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">What offence, sweet Beatrice?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">You have stayed me in a happy hour: I was about to</div>
                              <div class="line">protest I loved you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">And do it with all thy heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">I love you with so much of my heart that none is</div>
                              <div class="line">left to protest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, bid me do any thing for thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Kill Claudio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! not for the wide world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">You kill me to deny it. Farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Tarry, sweet Beatrice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am gone, though I am here: there is no love in</div>
                              <div class="line">you: nay, I pray you, let me go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Beatrice,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, I will go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll be friends first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">You dare easier be friends with me than fight with mine enemy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Is Claudio thine enemy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he not approved in the height a villain, that</div>
                              <div class="line">hath slandered, scorned, dishonoured my kinswoman? O</div>
                              <div class="line">that I were a man! What, bear her in hand until they</div>
                              <div class="line">come to take hands; and then, with public</div>
                              <div class="line">accusation, uncovered slander, unmitigated rancour,</div>
                              <div class="line">--O God, that I were a man! I would eat his heart</div>
                              <div class="line">in the market-place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me, Beatrice,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Talk with a man out at a window! A proper saying!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but, Beatrice,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet Hero! She is wronged, she is slandered, she is undone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Beat--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Princes and counties! Surely, a princely testimony,</div>
                              <div class="line">a goodly count, Count Comfect; a sweet gallant,</div>
                              <div class="line">surely! O that I were a man for his sake! or that I</div>
                              <div class="line">had any friend would be a man for my sake! But</div>
                              <div class="line">manhood is melted into courtesies, valour into</div>
                              <div class="line">compliment, and men are only turned into tongue, and</div>
                              <div class="line">trim ones too: he is now as valiant as Hercules</div>
                              <div class="line">that only tells a lie and swears it. I cannot be a</div>
                              <div class="line">man with wishing, therefore I will die a woman with grieving.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Tarry, good Beatrice. By this hand, I love thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Use it for my love some other way than swearing by it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Think you in your soul the Count Claudio hath wronged Hero?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BEATRICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, as sure as I have a thought or a soul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BENEDICK</div>
                              <div class="line">Enough, I am engaged; I will challenge him. I will</div>
                              <div class="line">kiss your hand, and so I leave you. By this hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">Claudio shall render me a dear account. As you</div>
                              <div class="line">hear of me, so think of me. Go, comfort your</div>
                              <div class="line">cousin: I must say she is dead: and so, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A prison.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DOGBERRY, VERGES, and Sexton, in gowns; and
the Watch, with CONRADE and BORACHIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Is our whole dissembly appeared?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, a stool and a cushion for the sexton.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Sexton</div>
                              <div class="line">Which be the malefactors?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, that am I and my partner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VERGES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that's certain; we have the exhibition to examine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Sexton</div>
                              <div class="line">But which are the offenders that are to be</div>
                              <div class="line">examined? let them come before master constable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, marry, let them come before me. What is your</div>
                              <div class="line">name, friend?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Borachio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, write down, Borachio. Yours, sirrah?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a gentleman, sir, and my name is Conrade.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Write down, master gentleman Conrade. Masters, do</div>
                              <div class="line">you serve God?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, sir, we hope.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Write down, that they hope they serve God: and</div>
                              <div class="line">write God first; for God defend but God should go</div>
                              <div class="line">before such villains! Masters, it is proved already</div>
                              <div class="line">that you are little better than false knaves; and it</div>
                              <div class="line">will go near to be thought so shortly. How answer</div>
                              <div class="line">you for yourselves?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CONRADE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, we say we are none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">A marvellous witty fellow, I assure you: but I</div>
                              <div class="line">will go about with him. Come you hither, sirrah; a</div>
                              <div class="line">word in your ear: sir, I say to you, it is thought</div>
                              <div class="line">you are false knaves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BORACHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I say to you we are none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, stand aside. 'Fore God, they are both in a</div>
                              <div class="line">tale. Have you writ down, that they are none?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Sexton</div>
                              <div class="line">Master constable, you go not the way to examine:</div>
                              <div class="line">you must call forth the watch that are their accusers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOGBERRY</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, marry, that's the eftest way. Let the watch</div>
                              <div class="line">come forth. Masters, I charge you, in the prince's</div>
                              <div class="line">name, accuse these men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
